Title: Cameron LNG takes precautions ahead of Hurricane Idaâ€™s landfall
Description: The Sempra-operated 13.5 million tonnes a year (mtpa) Cameron LNG export plant in Hackberry, is taking precautions to ensure safe operations ahead of the impending landfall of hurricane Ida in Louisiana on Aug. 29
Author: CK

Title: At least one Philippines LNG project to start by end 2022
Description: Power producer First Gen's 5.26 million tonnes a year (mtpa) floating import terminal project in the country's Batangas Bay is scheduled to to begin commercial operations in the third-quarter of 2022 and is one of two projects that were approved for construction. Four other projects are awaiting a financial close and approval to construct
Author: CK
